ygData.subject: Re: New Merchant - Spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, not sure really.  Just lucky? NO really, the merchants are all kindly, I use Augment of course, I wear the CHA veil, and our other stuff, and I go. ...
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, not sure really. Just lucky?
NO really, the merchants are all kindly, I use Augment
of course, I wear the CHA veil, and our other stuff,
and I go.

--- Mistywinds <hjwalla@...> wrote:
> From: "Mistywinds" <hjwalla@...>
>
> How did you get that price, i have a 106 chr and it
> was 177pp
> + '''
> + (o o)
> +----------oOOO--(_)------------------+
> [ -=Harold=- ]
> [ -=Wallace=- is ]
> [ -=Mistywinds=-]
> +----=------------------oOOO----------+
> + |__|__|
> + || ||
> + ooO Ooo @-=1999=-

> > > >

> that

> MUCH
> > > > less.
> > > >
> > > > --- Charles Adams <sirkal@...> wrote:
> > > > > From: Charles Adams <sirkal@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > Some minor new info for everyone. After the
> patch
> > > > > there is now a Merchant
> > > > > that sells Star Rubies, Fire Emeralds, and
> > > > Sapphires
> > > > > as part of her normal
> > > > > items.
> > > > >
> > > > > It is M. Sparkle. She is located in West
> > > > Commonlands
> > > > > in the small hut right
> > > > > outside Befallen.
> > > > >
> > > > > Prices are as follows:
> > > > >
> > > > > Star Rubies - 156 plat
> > > > > Fire Emeralds - 204 plat
> > > > > Sapphires - 240 plat
> > > > >
> > > > > Hope this helps someone.
> > > > >
> > > > > Charles
> > > > > Xezol - Lvl 14 Dwarf Paladin on Prexus
> > > > > Xezol - Lvl 15 Gnome Mag on E'Ci
> > > > >
